name: Director's Mansion
description:
The game is a Stanley's Parable inspired, comedy, horror game. It is a narrative experience that is best taken slow to bring out it's full immersion.

  • Narrative Game
  • Choose your own Adventure
  • Comedy
  • Mild Horror
  • Achievements!
  • 12 years and older

What is the Objective?

The objective of the game is to immerse yourself in the story, as well as to explore your own path. There are multiple achievements to encounter too! Essentially do whatever you want.

Controls:

Movement: WASD

Left Click: Interact

Right Click: Inspect/Insert Key

Shift: Sprint

Spacebar: Jump

R: Rotate Inspected Objects

Tab: Diary

What are the Requirements?

Director's Mansion is compressed into a Zip Folder. In order to access the game you will need a program which you can extract the game file from, and a Windows PC with Minimum Specifications. 

[Please Note: The Game is Still in Beta State. The most noticeable bug being dialogue overlapping.]
